title: 3 "Vengeful Demon of the Abandoned School - Part II"(Japanese:「廃校の復讐鬼」〜第三段〜) October 15, 1999(1999-10-15)
transformers_text: 3 Vengeful Demon of the Abandoned School Part II Japanese October 15 1999 1999 10 15 Sakon reveals that the policeman is the killer seeking revenge He is the brother of Osamu a student who committed suicide after the puppetry club members bullied him years ago
tf_idf_text: vengeful demon abandon school part japanese october sakon reveals policeman killer seek revenge brother osamu student commit suicide puppetry club member bully year ago
